paper_abstract: This paper proposes a new method for representing document collections with conceptual multidimensional spaces inferred from their contents. Such spaces are built from a set of interesting word co-occurrences, which are properly arranged into taxonomies to define orthogonal hierarchical dimensions. As a result, users can explore and analyze the contents of large document collections by making use of well-known OLAP operators (On-Line Analytic Processing) over these spaces.
paper_title: Inferring multidimensional cubes for representing conceptual document spaces
